column4: hello, does somone have a problem wiht ATI drivers? Because my sistem freezing every 5 min

this is tutorial which i followed http://wiki.cchtml.com/index.php/Ubuntu_Edgy_Installation_Guide

was your system in working order before this all started
and what did you do that might be the cause
infact just tell me this how big is your swap file
on dapper worked normaln, on edgy eft i have problems
ok then i think i know what happend

you will need to backup precious files and
